paragraphs: Most of the programming I do, is either for learning, or for fun. My main interests lie in the old languages and unix like opporating systems, But I try to dabble in a bit of everything.</br>  The goal of this website is to help others avoid pit falls and solve taskes that are not always the most stright forward. I would love to hear from anyone who comes across this page even if it's just to chat. jjvolkmer22@gmail.com Cheers!
